item.title: General Seminar
item.description: Welcome to the ACL! The ACL General Seminar has begun. Talks will be given every Friday at 4pm. Send an email with the title “General Seminar” to contact@acl.institute in order to join.
item.content:
Welcome to the ACL!

The ACL General Seminar has begun. Talks will be given every Friday at 4pm. Send an email with the title “General Seminar” to contact@acl.institute in order to join.
